contexts.context: ...So many people simply buy the items they need at the <mark>price</mark> they are given. It's a very sad state of affairs...
...but comment that, regretfully, you simply cannot afford such a <mark>price</mark>. When the shop-keeper compliments your taste, smile...
...or need, buy it then and there at the best <mark>price</mark> you can get. I cannot tell you how many times...
...the region, perhaps at a larger town at a better <mark>price</mark>. Too late, I discovered I was wrong, and...
...gone. Better to get a great purchase at a decent <mark>price</mark> and discover it again at a worse price than to miss...
...at a decent price and discover it again at a worse <mark>price</mark> than to miss out on your opportunities for ownership. Occasionally...
...enchanter shops are under Skar as well. Commodities at reasonable <mark>prices</mark>, but with smaller selections, are available from the smith...
